QuestData.Title: The Great Sambino
QuestData.Description: If you're heading down the trench, I'd like you to check in one of our novice members for me.$B$BHis name is Sam, but he's likely to embellish it a bit. He doesn't really understand how members of the Earthen Ring work, but he tries hard, so we try to give him the benefit of the doubt.$B$BDon't get too wrapped up in helping him with his crazy schemes. Just make sure he's still in one piece and let me know so that I can have a little peace of mind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find "Sam" at the western end of Silver Tide Trench.
QuestData.RewardText: Another fan of the Great Sambino! Come all this way for an autograph perhaps? I'm far too busy to be signing anything... move along now.
